lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: luck isn't everything in life, sometimes it helps if the scales get tipped a bit in your favor. I like the idea of taking on a tiny bit of risk when the reward to someone else is possibly much greater than that risk to me.
lender.occupational_info: I program computers. The systems that I program help a small college find deserving young people to study here and receive a wonderful education.

lender.name: Gladys
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that products are correct and there is a system to make sure this happens.

lender.name: Michaela
lender.occupation: Diversity Coordinator at a High School

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: Only $25 can change a life!

lender.name: Cherilyn
lender.loan_because: I want to help others make their lives and their community better.
lender.occupational_info: I work part-time serving Dippin' Dots ice cream at hockey games and at Jackson Hewitt Tax Services during tax season.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others throughout Planet Earth to reach their potential and do their best for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am an environmental engineer, working to improve water quality and to educate university students about energy, water, climate change, solid waste and other key issues of our time.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by this concept.
lender.occupational_info: I have been creating and selling my artwork for the past 35 years. I sculpt each piece and embellish it with found objects, antique textiles and mosaic glass.

lender.name: Sabrina V
lender.loan_because: I can, and I care.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I want people in the world to know how generous most people in the United States and other developed countries are.
lender.occupational_info: I spent the last 20 years as an attorney working on complex financial transactions. Now I want to see finance used to more meaningfully impact the lives of people.

lender.name: Les and Karen
lender.loan_because: Providing people of integrity with funds to develop a means to work stabilizes their income, community, and ultimately their country.

lender.name: Christine RUSSIER
lender.loan_because: I like to translate my ideas into acts
lender.occupational_info: I give advice to farmers when they create a farm. I explain law when there is a conflict. I help the farmers in their problems, for instance at the time of divorce.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: Give a hand if you have a hand to give.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: this makes great sense!!!
lender.occupational_info: How to heal yourself - yourself!

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I can and because I should. And because it's fun.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want people to be able to use their intelligence and energy to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work at building hospitals and clinics where people can get health care.

lender.name: Jaco
lender.loan_because: I believe this is an excellent way to support people with the right entrepreneurial spirit!

lender.name: Mary Katherine
lender.loan_because: we like connecting with our global neighbors and learning about the world and ourselves.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Ever since I heard of the work of the Grameen bank I've been interested in this approach. I chose a farmer because I love gardening.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer working at a state mental hospital.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: It is a joy to share what I have with those who can use it.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and I live on a small farm.

lender.name: Ms. B
lender.loan_because: My students and I want to lend money to people in order to empower them and to give them hope.

lender.name: Margo
lender.loan_because: I can and I care.
lender.occupational_info: Helping to make the places that we live, work and learn to be healthy for us and Earth.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the human element that Kiva provides. I like to know who I am supporting and how they hope to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work on budgeting and financial analysis for a global electronics manufacturer.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can to help reduce socioeconomic inequality around the world.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: I have traveled to a lot of developing countries and seen the challenges people face.

lender.name: Fraser cousins
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in countries around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We go to public school.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: It is a good, simple activity that does real good in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I use visible light to study infectious diseases.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: Help others have the opportunity to be successful.

lender.name: Harun
lender.loan_because: membantu yang membutuhkan

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I admire the ambition and initiative of borrowers confronting such challenging life circumstances. Thanks to Kiva, it's easy.

lender.name: Suki
lender.loan_because: I can and should.
lender.occupational_info: Waste Reduction - Recycling Coordinator

lender.name: lisa
lender.loan_because: i want to help everyone that i am able to both locally and globally
lender.occupational_info: helping people attain thier educational goals

lender.name: andrew
lender.loan_because: I believe that microloans are the best way to invest in less-developed countries. The moneys go directly to those in need...no beauracracies to snarl OUR progress.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: industrious people get my vote
lender.occupational_info: Hard work, payed for for what you do. Happy to see someone willing to work.

lender.name: Jorge
lender.loan_because: it feels good!
lender.occupational_info: a student at Saint Mary's College with one more semester to go.

lender.name: Ran
lender.loan_because: it feels great to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I make video games and iPhone apps

lender.name: Marty
lender.loan_because: It's an opportunity to help without relying on government agencies.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get through emergencies, whether there's a fire, a car accident, or a medical emergency.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: tikkun olam. the perfect world is the one in which we all help each other.

lender.name: Eddie
lender.loan_because: As a business owner I feel a kinship with other owners who want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help people live better lives.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: It is important to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I help sell magazines.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to improve their situation, I'd hope someone would give me a helping hand should I ever need it.
lender.occupational_info: I buy, sell & manage broodmares & racehorses for clients, not curing cancer, but I love it.

lender.name: Kimi
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me enough that I am able to pass it on to others.

lender.name: Fabio
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Jon & Michelle
lender.loan_because: We've owned and built our own business over many years. Getting started is hard, so helping individuals with great ideas start accomplishing their dreams is very worthwhile.
lender.occupational_info: Once individuals or business owners are ready to stop working, we help them plan, execute, and enjoy their retirement.

lender.name: Sterling
lender.loan_because: Great way to give to those who need it and are willing to better themselves on their own!
lender.occupational_info: I go to School at Baylor University and Im a Business/Pre-Dental Student.

lender.name: Nilgun
lender.loan_because: I like to help people less fortunate than me...

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: I watched the video and believe in Kiva
lender.occupational_info: starting a business with a wicked cool product for trying and learning about different wines.

lender.name: 'Russ'
lender.loan_because: My family inspires me on a daily basis and who's investments have made me feel like the luckiest person on earth. Paying it forward in this small way.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies make and save money by solving business problems with wireless technlogy.

lender.name: Reinier
lender.loan_because: Life's good ...

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I live in a country where I have more opportunities and I have some money that I do not need to survive, so I hope it can make the world we all share a better place. I hope, that we as citizens of the world protect all the people, animals, and the planet and our actions show respect for all things. I hope that people trying hard to succeed remember how they treat the planet and its environment, helps or hurts all of us, and I recognize that I and my peers have a much greater impact, and I work daily to improve how I and my peers treat the only planet we have to live on.
lender.occupational_info: I support adults who have varying types of mental and some physical disabilities in all aspects of their life from getting dressed and eating a meal to going swimming, bowllng, attending a concert, to supporting them doing their errands, grocery shopping, banking, buying clothes, and when possible supporting them in volunteer or paid work - like helping prepare meals in an activity centre, sort clothes in a second-hand store. I support them to do everything they can do. I also have a degree in teaching children.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: A trip to Ghana changed my life and I saw first-hand how micro-loans change lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help people discover God's grace and purpose by leading them to mission and service projects both in the US and abroad.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: It's important to pay it forward.

lender.name: Yannick & Danae
lender.loan_because: we care about others

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I hope it will make a positive difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I provide clinical services and health education to improve and maintain oral health.

lender.name: Nathaniel
lender.loan_because: I am excited that there is finally a way for me to see what happens to my "donations".
lender.occupational_info: I help design the propulsion systems that power submarines and aircraft carriers.

lender.name: Buddha
lender.loan_because: I want for nothing

lender.name: Destinations Gallery
lender.loan_because: Together we can help change the future for these people, their families, their communities, their countries, and our World.
lender.occupational_info: I specialize in landscape, wildlife and travel photography, which I sell on my website, www.DestinationsGallery.com. Kiva members get a 10% discount, plus I will donate 20% of the purchase amount to Kiva loans. (Use coupon code KIVA during checkout) Come check it out :)

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that my small contribution can help someone make a difference for themselves. I have had help along the way from friends and am so glad to be able to help someone myself now.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a teacher of students between the ages of 11 and 14 for about 13 years now. I teach reading and writing.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It is good Karma.

lender.name: Kristina
lender.loan_because: it's important.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: i like giving money to people with a good idea

lender.loan_because: Mathew 25:15-40

lender.loan_because:

38'And when did we see You a stranger, and invite You in, or naked, and clothe You?
39 'When did we see You sick, or in prison, and come to You?'
40 "(AL)The King will answer and say to them, 'Truly I say to you, (AM)to the extent that you did it to one of these brothers of Mine, even the least of them, you did it to Me.'

lender.loan_because: To help make the world a better place for all of us.

lender.name: Meggan
lender.occupational_info: Just see my website.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: "I am my brother's keeper, I am my sister's keeper"

lender.occupational_info: I own a laminating company where we apply plastic to printed materials such as menus, maps, sales tools, posters, etc.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I like to help others prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I write a lot...

lender.name: paula

lender.occupational_info: I seek to bring joy to others through making paintings and photographs that convey my appreciation for nature, for humanity.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I care about the common good of humanity. I believe that God wants us to help others while we help ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the health field. I really enjoy working in a helping profession because I am passionate about people and their well-being.

lender.name: gary and erika
lender.occupational_info: I make loans to sustainable businesses. Erika teaches people to use their body to help their mind.

lender.name: sheenna
lender.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give. -Winston Churchill
lender.occupational_info: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others...

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to make a difference even though I don't have that much money to spend. Kiva gives me the opportunity to have my donation make an impact over and over again!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at the University of Pennsylvania in Philadelphia studying English literature.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people and allow them to improve their current condition on their own will.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: people have the right to dream of a better way of life, and I want to help them achieve their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I am an agent of social change

lender.name: John Langdon
lender.loan_because: Even at my lowest point in life, I still have it good. If I can lend $25 and help a family purchase material to put a roof on their home, I'll do it and hope you do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a musician and film composer.

lender.name: Ary
lender.loan_because: I want to support small entrepreneurs in Africa
lender.occupational_info: I help Small and medium sized entreprises (SME) to improve their quality of business and operation.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I was very inspired by the mission of Kiva. I find it very exciting to help others in this way.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for helping sell computer software to companies that want to do their business more efficiently and increase revenues, decrease costs and manage risk.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people to built their own business like me

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I want to ensure everyone has the opportunity to grow, regardless of where they live.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers to help people work together in creating ways for young people to share and learn new outdoor experiences.

lender.name: Roos
lender.loan_because: I think more must be shared over the world and small loans are an exellent way to do that.
lender.occupational_info: Psychologist in own practice. Web 2.0 fan. Admin of Twitter @in2mh account and in2mentalhealth Facebook page. Mental Health Trainer for MSF Holland.

lender.loan_because: I want my money to have some impact rather than sitting there doing nothing. I have travelled SE Asia extensively and Kiva allows me the opportunity to directly help people living there.

lender.name: jean
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to be a blessing.
lender.occupational_info: I help design and define new computer systems

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It's a way of having a big impact, directly to the people who need the help. I add money monthly to my account and re-loan the money that's been paid back. I love watching the loans multiply. My hopes and prayers for all of those that we help through Kiva. It's a wonderful organization.
lender.occupational_info: I manage people who develop computer software. I explain what the software does to our sales people and customers. I explain to the engineers what our sales people and customers want the software to do.

lender.name: Kendall
lender.loan_because: I believe one person can make a difference in a person's life and I want to support the hard work of others as they work to support thier families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school teacher in Northern California, I teach and model for my students, good stewardship of the earth and compassion for our fellow human beings.

lender.name: Ellie
lender.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful way to help those in need... a little bit at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a library where people approach me and ask me for help when they need it.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: We can help people who are helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Our family has a catering company and we serve meals to groups of 50 to 2,500. We also manage the food services and a coffee shop at our local college.

lender.name: Sameen
lender.loan_because: it gives me pleasure to help around pleasure and to witness their successes.

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help in realizing their dreams.

lender.name: Gregory Burd
lender.loan_because: We should. One world. One people. One goal. Truth, freedom, happiness for all.

lender.loan_because: I have been afforded many opportunities throughout my life and I want to do the same for like minded individuals around the world.
